label: Select your clinical site
required: if (clinicalSite === null) "Select the site the identifier is associated with"

label: Change the status of the idenfier
required: if (status === null) "Please indicate the current status of the identifier"

label: Provide additional details as to why the identifier was removed
required: status ! == null ? (status.name == "Deprecated" && statusRemoved === null ? "Please indicate why the identifier was removed" : false) : false

label: If other was selected, please provide additional information.
required: status !== null ? status.name === "Other" && statusOther === null ? "Please provide additional information" : false : false

label: Enter the date the identifier was created
required: if (dateCreated === null) "Enter the date the identifier was created"

label: Enter the date the identifier was assigned
required: status !== null ? (status.name === "Assigned" && dateAssigned === null ? "Please enter the date the identifier was assigned" : false) : false

label: Enter the date when the record was changed
Enter the name of the person that modified this record
